article.title: Revised and Improved Value of the QED Tenth-Order Electron Anomalous Magnetic Moment

choices: A diagram showing the interaction between photons and fermions.
A diagram illustrating the concept of UV divergence.
The contribution of the electroweak interaction to the electron anomalous magnetic moment.
The expression for the mass-dependent terms of the QED contribution to the electron anomalous magnetic moment.
The formula for calculating the hadronic contribution to the electron anomalous magnetic moment.
The perturbation series of the fine-structure constant α.
The contribution of Set V to the tenth-order mass-independent term.
The updated value of the tenth-order mass-independent contribution to the electron anomalous magnetic moment.
The total QED contribution to the electron anomalous magnetic moment.
The combined uncertainty of the hadronic contribution to the electron anomalous magnetic moment.
The definition of the magnetic moment amplitudes (∆Mn).
The expression for the physical contribution of Set V to the electron anomalous magnetic moment.
The procedure for numerical integration of ∆M10 by VEGAS.
The method for mapping Feynman parameters to integration variables.
